name: World Eater (KHARN11)
description:
Good evening Warriors.

Today I created a project that partially depicts the escape of the World Eater from the ship of the Word Bearers.

To begin with, this is only a prototype, in the future it will be refined and supplemented, but I want you to feel the whole atmosphere and the gloomy mysterious essence of the ship full of demons and defeat the chief captain of the ship, who is not averse to telling you what happened on this ship and Not only !

Well, I will be very glad to your answers and comments!
